data.title: Zhangjiajie West Railway Station Hotel Reviews: 67 Verified Reviews Latest 2024
meta_keywords: Zhangjiajie West Railway Station Hotel Reviews
data.meta_description: Discover 67 Zhangjiajie West Railway Station Hotel reviews, rated 4.8 by real travelers on Trip.com. Explore what previous guests loved about the hotel, including its services, amenities, location, rooms, and more!
data.text:
5.0/5

Outstanding

Posted on Jul 28, 2024

We slept there just for one night as it was close to the railway station, and waw it was a good surprise! The room is clean and really correct, especially in comparison to the price. And above all, the owner is REALLY KIND, and helped us + gave us some food for free without expecting anything.

Response from Property : Thank you so much for your recognition of Zhangjiajie West Railway Station hotel ! I hope Zhangjiajie West Railway Station hotel and the beauty of Zhangjiajie can bring you infinite beautiful memories! Looking forward to your next stay! Services: Free transfer to Zhangjiajie West Railway Station Facilities: free parking, free WIFI, separate toilet, 24 hours hot water, air conditioning

5.0/5

Outstanding

Posted on Oct 18, 2023

Very nice hotel, especially for early train departures or late arrivals as it is 5 minutes from the western train station Zhangjiajiexi. The owner is extremely friendly and very helpful. He showed us how to get to the city centre (bus 4 and 6), where to eat. In the morning he even brought us to the train station. Everything was clean and the bed was very comfortable. I highly recommend this place.

Response from Property : Thank you very much for taking time out of your busy schedule to review and affirm Zhangjiajie West Railway Station hotel; Thank you very much for your recognition of Zhangjiajie West Station hotel ! I hope Zhangjiajie West Railway Station hotel and the beauty of Zhangjiajie can bring you infinite beautiful memories! Looking forward to your next stay! The hotel is free to book tickets for each scenic spot

4.7/5

Amazing

Posted on Feb 4, 2024

Our journey in Zhangjiajie was amazing thanks to the kindness and attentiveness of our host. He didnâ€™t hesitate to drive us from the west station to the hostel and from the hostel to the west station or the closest bus stop. He even help us to find a drugstore when I told him I hurt my eyes. I highly recommended you to sleep at this hostel if you want to spend nice holidays visiting Zhangjiajie park which is quite close from the hostel by bus.

Outstanding

Posted on Nov 11, 2023

The room is spacious and bright, very quiet at night, clean and sanitary. It can be seen that the boss is very attentive to the business. The boss also takes the initiative to pick up and drop off. It is really worth it. The big bed is very comfortable

I hope Zhangjiajie West Station Inn can bring you infinite beautiful memories like the beautiful scenery of Zhangjiajie! Looking forward to your next stay!

5.0/5

Outstanding

Posted on Apr 25, 2024

The room is clean and tidy, the facilities are complete, the service is thoughtful,,,, it is close to the West Station, the price is affordable, and the boss will pick you up! ! ! Trustworthy

Original TextTranslated by Google

Response from Property : Thank you very much for your recognition of Zhangjiajie West Station Inn, and we look forward to your next stay! 1. Service: Free pick-up and drop-off at Zhangjiajie West Station 2. Apartment type: Single-family villa (not a residential building, please pay attention to identify to avoid pitfalls) 3. Facilities: Free parking, free WIFI, separate bathroom, Gree air conditioning, 24-hour hot water (Gree air-energy water heater is heated on the roof of the 5th floor of the homestay: safe, good heating effect, large amount of hot water) 4. Guest room floors: 1st, 3rd and 4th floors; the 2nd floor is the lobby and the landlord's self-occupied floor (the homestay is a single-family villa in the tourist characteristic block on the left front of the entrance to Zhangjiajie West Station. It is not a homestay converted from a commercial house in a residential building. Please pay attention to identify to avoid pitfalls! ) 5. There are washing machines, washing powder and clothes hangers on the 5th floor, which can be used for free to wash and dry clothes

5.0/5

Outstanding

Posted on Aug 13, 2023

The landlord is very considerate. I have a lot of luggage, so he arranged it on the first floor. I left early in the morning, and the landlord sent me to the West Station early in the morning. The room is in good sanitary conditions and is relatively large. There is also a toilet cover. In short, I am very satisfied and recommend it

Original TextTranslated by Google

Response from Property : Thank you very much for taking the time out of your busy schedule to comment and affirm Zhangjiajie West Station Inn; thank you very much for your recognition of Zhangjiajie West Station Inn! I hope that Zhangjiajie West Station Inn can bring you infinite beautiful memories like the beautiful scenery of Zhangjiajie! Looking forward to your next stay! This inn strongly recommends friends to use Didi Taxi, the reason is: the price is cheap, fair and affordable, and you will not be deceived, (bus or scan the code to use the shared electric motorcycle on the roadside) It is particularly important to note that the actual distance between Zhangjiajie West Station and Zhangjiajie West Station Inn is only 1 kilometer. It takes 2.5 minutes to 5 minutes to take a Didi taxi from Zhangjiajie West Station to Zhangjiajie West Station Inn (including the time to wait for the red light). I hope friends will not be misled by the bad taxi drivers at the exit of Zhangjiajie West Station and the side of Zhangjiajie West Station Square! ! ! This inn is free of charge to book tickets for various scenic spots

5.0/5
